property.name: editable
property.onset: if (val) this.setAttribute('editable', 'true'); else this.removeAttribute('editable'); return val;

property.name: currentIndex
property.onset: if (this.view) return this.view.selection.currentIndex = val; return val;

property.name: enableColumnDrag
property.onset: if (val) this.setAttribute('enableColumnDrag', 'true'); else this.removeAttribute('enableColumnDrag'); return val;
